revised_title: A Case Study of Tumours Causing Bone Softening
tldr: The author presents a case study of a patient with tumours that rendered his bones soft. The patient experienced various symptoms, including sleepiness, pain, and thirst. Despite various treatments, the patient eventually succumbed to the disease. Upon dissection, it was found that the tumours had caused the bones to be dissolved and replaced with a suetty substance.
